title: Ep74: Drunk Sex, Ghosts, and Bums feat Rory
itunes:title: Ep74: Drunk Sex, Ghosts, and Bums feat Rory
description:
This week the duo is joined by Rory, 1/3 of the Joe Budden Podcast. The group breaks the ice with Rory before getting on the topic of drunk sex and consent. Can you give consent if you're drunk and in what ways should the conversation shift on the matter. The kink of the week has to do with ghosts, and people are really out here having sex with spirits child! To read more on what prompted this week's kink, check out this article: https://broadly.vice.com/en_us/article/mb9gkq/fed-up-with-mortal-men-women-are-having-sex-with-ghosts?utm_source=broadlytwitterus Finally, the group discuss what Rory feels are qualities a girlfriend should possess and later it shifts to "dating bums" and the infamous "What is broke to you?" discussion is had. Follow our guest Rory @ThisisRory on all social media platforms and check out Dussepalooza and the Joe Budden Podcast All caught up? Want more episodes? Receive 2 bonus episodes per month by becoming a patron Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions Also, send in your hoemail to whoreibledecisions@gmail.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
